pages.text: $(o)Well done. Yes, the Slow-Fall effect of the Phantom Membrane was concentrated into this residue. $(p)There is another reaction, this one granting $(item)Levitation$(0). $(p)With both of these effects together, some form of true Flight is within reach.

$(o)The levitation reaction is related to one of these $(thing)Objects of Study$(0). $(p)I'm sure you'll figure it out eventually!$(p)...You might want $(l:reactive:results/crystal_iron)protection$(/l).
